title: epsilon figure?
content:
Anyone know what fonts have the epsilon figure? What is the key?

Cheers

 [‹ Why do you want to study type design?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906165239/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17612 "Go to previous forum topic") [French vs. English book layout ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906165239/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17603 "Go to next forum topic")
author: stephen_k

comments.content:
Which one? :-)

[Unicode Character Search: epsilon (60 hits)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906165239/http:/www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/search.htm?q=epsilon&preview=entity)

[GREEK SMALL LETTER EPSILON (U+03B5) Font Support](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906165239/http:/www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/03b5/fontsupport.htm)
There is also an IPA epsilon U+025B
